title: CsPb2Br5-assisted direct crystallization of the 3D perovskite phase for highly efficient and stable solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00229F, Communication
Caiyun Gao, Kun Gao, Bingqian Zhang, Xiuhong Sun, Qiangqiang Zhao, Xiao Wang, Feng Wang, Mingliang Sun, Guanglei Cui, Shuping Pang
The Î±-FAPbI3 was achieved through a direct growth strategy of CsPb2Br5 seed induction at room temperature. This strategy has delivered a superior PCE of 25.55%, the PSCs exhibit excellent stability, and the module efficiency was increased to 22.35%.
